Назад

Yaroslav Pryhoda

Developer in Microsoft

Kyiv, Ukraine

Биография

Returns the compression middleware using the given options. The middleware will attempt to compress response bodies for all request that traverse through the middleware, based on the given options. This middleware will never compress responses that include a Cache-Control header with the no-transform directive, as compressing will transform the body.

Навыки

HTML
CSS
Java Script
Node JS
